meanings.definition: A person who lives on a houseboat.
meanings.sent1: The houseboaters enjoyed the calm waters of the lake.
meanings.sent2: Many houseboaters prefer the freedom of living on the water.
meanings.sent3: The houseboaters had a barbecue on their floating home.
meanings.sent4: The houseboaters were like sailors of the land.
meanings.sent5: The houseboaters' lifestyle is unique and adventurous.

meanings.sent1: We waved to the group of houseboaters passing by.
meanings.sent2: The lake was dotted with colorful houseboaters.
meanings.sent3: The houseboaters gathered for a sunset party on the water.
meanings.sent4: The houseboaters moved gracefully along the river.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the houseboaters echoed across the lake.
